name: Job Portal
desc: Developed a MERN-based job portal for job seekers to apply and recruiters to post/manage jobs. Tech-stack: React JS, Node JS, MongoDB, Express JS.

name: Music Recommendation System Based on Facial Emotion
desc: Detects user emotions via webcam and recommends mood-based songs using a trained ML model. Tech: React, Flask, TensorFlow, Keras.

name: Seamless Chat App
desc: A real-time chat application with user authentication,real-time msg, end-to-end encryption. Tech: React Native, Node.js, Socket.io, MongoDB.

name: Test case generator application with github
desc: A Web app that connects to GitHub, analyzes code with AI to generate test cases, and creates PR. Tech: React, Node.js, GitHub OAuth, Gemini API.

name: Smart Ambulance Booking System
desc: Mobile app for real-time ambulance booking, driver tracking, and (admin) hospital bed updates. Tech: Flutter, Firebase, Google Maps API, Node.js, React.

name: My Portfolio
desc: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience. Tech: React JS, CSS, HTML.

name: Crypto Crash Game
desc: An online real-time multiplayer crash game where players bet in USD, converted to crypto, and try to cash out before the multiplier crashes.Tech: React, Node.js, Socket.io, MongoDB.

name: Chatbot AI
desc: An intelligent voice/text assistant using GPT API to perform tasks, answer queries, and hold natural conversations. Tech: HTML,CSS, JavaScript, GPT API
